title: Is anyone here interested in a casual WoW guild?
body:
So I've been mythic raiding in my time away from League. 

Everything was going smoothly until Mythic Gorefiend reared his ugly head, due to a combination of his fat and unforseen IRL things our mythic team had to disband.

I'm still with the guild, being an officer and all. By the looks of it we'll resign ourselves to casual heroic runs until Legion. However there's a chance that mightn't even work out. I've been asking a bunch of friends if they were interested in playing WoW in a casual guild, and by the looks of it I might be able to put together a pretty decent roster. 

There's a handful of GDers who've told me they'd be interested so I figured I may as well ask the rest of you.
